We are fine, Alhamdulillah,%0D%0A%0D%0A1. If you realise that you have not concentrated in a portion of the salah, you should not go back and repeat that portion. Rather focus on what is left to be read.%0D%0A%0D%0A2. It is the practice of many of our Ulama to perform this Salah every Friday, before Zawaal, however performing it at night, in complete seclusion would also be praiseworthy and beneficial.%0D%0A%0D%0A3. The manner you have adopted to gain concentration is fine.Try to keep good company and if possible build a spiritual relationship with a pious person.%0D%0A%0D%0A4. Nabi (sallallahu Alaihi wasallam) used a ring for the purpose of sealing letters to kings. If one needs a ring for sealing letters, then he could wear such a ring with the niyyah of sunnah. For one who doesn't require a ring for that purpose, then it would better not wear it as the necessity does not exist.%0D%0A%0D%0AJazakallahu Khairaa for you kind words.
